abstract.t: This document describes procedures for BGP MPLS-based Ethernet VPNs (EVPN). The procedures described here meet the requirements specified in RFC 7209 -- "Requirements for Ethernet VPN (EVPN)".
_RFC EDITOR: please remove this section before publication_
The complete and detailed set of all changes between this version and RFC7432 may be found as an Annotated Diff (rfcdiff) here [1].
